option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/Users/zwerg/seadrive_root/Seafile/Meine Bibliothek/Java/Eigene Projekte/Catto":"{\"/src/main/java/org/example/Main.java\":\"This Java file implements an interactive animated cat application.\\n\\nKey functions:\\n\\n- main() - Entry point, loads icons, initializes GUI frame, timers, mouse listeners\\n- loadIcons() - Loads all the animated GIF icons from resources\\n- handleMouseClick() - Handles mouse clicks, plays meow animation \\n- initializeMeowTimer() - Initializes timer for meow animation\\n- setCatIdleIcon() - Sets idle icon based on cat position\\n- updateCatMovement() - Handles cat movement towards mouse, animation states\\n- movementTimer - Drives cat movement animation \\n- stretchingTimer - Triggers stretching animation\\n- returnToIdleTimer - Returns cat to idle after stretching\\n- layingTimer, sleepingTimer - Triggers laying and sleeping animations\\n- meowTimer - Handles meow animation playback\\n- standUpTimer - Handles standing up from sleeping animation\\n\\nIt animates the cat moving towards and following the mouse cursor. It plays idle, running, stretching, laying, sleeping and meow animations on timers and mouse clicks. The GUI frame is transparent and always on top to simulate a pet cat.\",\"/pom.xml\":\"This pom.xml file is the project object model (POM) file for a Maven project.\\n\\nThe key functions of this pom.xml file are:\\n\\n- Defines the project metadata like groupId, artifactId, version. This identifies the project.\\n\\n- Specifies the model version as 4.0.0 which is the latest Maven POM schema version. \\n\\n- Sets the Java compiler source and target versions to 21 to compile the project code with Java 21.\\n\\n- Defines the source code encoding as UTF-8.\\n\\n- Provides the basic project configuration that is required by Maven to build the project.\\n\\n- Acts as the central piece of configuration for the project. All Maven plugin configurations, dependencies etc will be specified in this file.\\n\\n- Allows the project to be built with Maven by providing all necessary configuration details in a standardized format.\\n\\nSo in summary, this pom.xml defines the core project details and configuration needed by Maven to build the project. It serves as the main configuration file for the Maven project.\"}"}
